Elections
=========

![elections](https://www.fairfieldtexas.com/sites/g/files/vyhlif5371/f/styles/news_image/public/pages/stockcake-voting_booth_scene_1729023139.jpg?itok=cq0jtzmA) 

### General Election

The 2024 General Election will be on Saturday, May 4, 2024, at the City of Fairfield’s Convention Center/Green Barn, located at 839 East Commerce St, Fairfield, Texas 75840. Contact the City Secretary, Misty Richardson, at (903) 389-2633 or by [email](https://www.fairfieldtexas.com/user/107/contact) with any questions. The General Election for 2025 will be on Saturday, May 3, 2025.

General Election May 2, 2026

General Election May 1, 2027

---

### Election Dates

Election-related dates and voting information can be found on the [Texas Secretary of State, Elections Division - Current Information](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/index.shtml) website (Posted in Accordance with TX. LEGIC. H.B. 305, Effective September 1, 2019).

---

### Candidate Information

Filing Requirements are per State Statute, available [Texas Secretary of State, Elections Division - Candidate Information](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/candidates/index.shtml).
